get.description: Retrieve the details of a single account.
Retrieve the details of a supported bank.
Return a user's [cursor-paginated](doc:pagination) list of transactions.

parameters.name: before
parameters.description: Cursor pointing to the end of the desired set.

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: Cursor pointing to the start of the desired set.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of records to return. Accepted values: 1 - 500.

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Limit to transactions created after the specified date.

parameters.name: until
parameters.description: Limit to transactions created before the specified date.

get.description: Returns the URL to Bridge's Connect funnel for adding an item

parameters.name: country
parameters.description: In the banks display, the country selector will default to the `country` parameter if provided. Available country codes : `fr`, `uk`, `de`, `es`, `nl`.

parameters.name: prefill_email
parameters.description: If the parameter is set, use to prefill the email of your user in the CGS/email validation page.

parameters.name: redirect_url
parameters.description: Optional redirect URL that temporarily overrides the application's redirect URL. **Only usable for sandbox applications**
